DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; BRITAIN ; IRA TALKS STILL PLANNED THIS YEAR
DOC.TEXT: London said it will open direct talks with Sinn Fein , the_Irish Republican Army ' s political wing , this year as planned , despite delays to Northern_Ireland ' s peace process . The fall of Ireland ' s government two weeks ago has upset the timetable for the fragile peace process and left Britain , less eager than Ireland to move ahead , in_charge . But Michael Ancram , junior minister responsible_for the province , said talks with Sinn Fein and Protestant paramilitary groups will start by the end of the year .
